thread.title: Experian says info from 15 million T-Mobile customers hacked - KTRE-TV Lufkin
thread.title_full: Experian says info from 15 million T-Mobile customers hacked - KTRE-TV Lufkin - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KTRE-TV Lufkin
title: Experian says info from 15 million T-Mobile customers hacked - KTRE-TV Lufkin
text:
Hackers have stolen personal information belonging to about 15 million T-Mobile wireless customers, including Social Security numbers, home addresses, birthdates and other personal information. The hackers got the information from credit reporting agency Experian, which T-Mobile uses to check the credit of its customers.
 KTRE-TV Lufkin.
